quests.desc: Who's got a virtual machine and is about to play through an exciting round of TextWorld? You do! Here is how to play! First stop, go east. And then, try to move south. Then, go west. Then, travel south. Then, make it so that the birch passageway is open. After that, try to take a trip east. And then, go to the east. With that done, attempt to go north. And then, make an attempt to travel north. With that over with, pick-up the book from the floor of the bedroom. That's it!

infos.name: bedroom
infos.desc:
You are in a bedroom. A typical kind of place. You can barely contain your excitement.

 You make out a dresser.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The dresser contains [a list of things in the c_0]. Wow, isn't TextWorld just the best?[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if]

 There is [if d_6 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gateway leading east. There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] passageway leading west. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: garage
infos.desc:
Guess what, you are in the place we're calling the garage.

 You see a TextWorld chest. The light flickers for a second, but nothing else happens.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The TextWorld chest contains [a list of things in the c_1]. The light flickers for a second, but nothing else happens.[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] passageway leading east. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: workshop
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a workshop. A standard kind of place. You begin looking for stuff.

 You smell an intriguing smell, and follow it to a chair. [if there is something on the s_0]On the chair you can see [a list of things on the s_0].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0]Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though.[end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the east. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: office
infos.desc:
You find yourself in an office. A typical kind of place. You decide to start listing off everything you see in the room, as if you were in a text adventure.



 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] birch passageway leading west. You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: shower
infos.desc:
If you're wondering why everything seems so ordinary all of a sudden, it's because you've just shown up in the shower. You begin to take stock of what's in the room.



 There is [if d_3 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading north. There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading east. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: laundromat
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a laundromat. A typical one.



 There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading west. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: laundry place
infos.desc:
You are in a laundry place. A normal kind of place. You decide to start listing off everything you see in the room, as if you were in a text adventure.

 If you haven't noticed it already, there seems to be something there by the wall, it's a rectangular locker.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The rectangular locker contains [a list of things in the c_2].[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] What a letdown! The rectangular locker is empty![end if] You can make out a drawer. There's something strange about this being here, but you can't put your finger on it.[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The drawer contains [a list of things in the c_3]. Suddenly, you bump your head on the ceiling, but it's not such a bad bump that it's going to prevent you from looking at objects and even things.[end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] The drawer is empty, what a horrible day![end if] You can make out a rack. The rack is typical.[if there is something on the s_1] On the rack you can make out [a list of things on the s_1]. Wow! Just like in the movies![end if][if there is nothing on the s_1] Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it. Hopefully this doesn't make you too upset.[end if]

 There is [if d_6 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gateway leading west. There is [if d_5 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading north.

infos.name: scullery
infos.desc:
You arrive in a scullery. An ordinary kind of place.

 You see [if c_4 is locked]a locked[else if c_4 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] fridge.[if c_4 is open and there is something in the c_4] The fridge contains [a list of things in the c_4], so there's that.[end if][if c_4 is open and the c_4 contains nothing] What a letdown! The fridge is empty![end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: chamber
infos.desc:
You arrive in a chamber. A typical kind of place. You try to gain information on your surroundings by using a technique you call 'looking.'

 [if c_5 is locked]A locked[else if c_5 is open]An open[otherwise]A closed[end if] box is right there by you.[if c_5 is open and there is something in the c_5] The box contains [a list of things in the c_5].[end if][if c_5 is open and the c_5 contains nothing] The box is empty, what a horrible day![end if] You can make out [if c_6 is locked]a locked[else if c_6 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] usual looking trunk in the room.[if c_6 is open and there is something in the c_6] The trunk contains [a list of things in the c_6].[end if][if c_6 is open and the c_6 contains nothing] What a letdown! The trunk is empty![end if]

 There is [if d_5 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading south. There is an unblocked exit to the east.

infos.name: steam room
infos.desc:
You are in a steam room. It seems to be pretty standard here. You try to gain information on your surroundings by using a technique you call 'looking.'

 You make out [if c_7 is locked]a locked[else if c_7 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] type 5 chest nearby.[if c_7 is open and there is something in the c_7] The type 5 chest contains [a list of things in the c_7].[end if][if c_7 is open and the c_7 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if]

 There is [if d_4 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] hatch leading east. There is [if d_3 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading south. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: studio
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a studio. A normal one.

 You lean against the wall, inadvertently pressing a secret button. The wall opens up to reveal a toolbox.[if c_8 is open and there is something in the c_8] The toolbox contains [a list of things in the c_8]. Suddenly, you bump your head on the ceiling, but it's not such a bad bump that it's going to prevent you from looking at objects and even things.[end if][if c_8 is open and the c_8 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if] You can make out an armchair. [if there is something on the s_2]You see [a list of things on the s_2] on the armchair.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2]However, the armchair, like an empty armchair, has nothing on it. Aw, here you were, all excited for there to be things on it![end if] You make out a mantelpiece. There's something about an object in a room that's just so... TextWorld. The mantelpiece is standard.[if there is something on the s_3] On the mantelpiece you make out [a list of things on the s_3].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_3] But the thing is empty. This always happens![end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the east. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. There is an unguarded exit to the south.

infos.name: sauna
infos.desc:
You are in a sauna. A typical kind of place. The room seems oddly familiar, as though it were only superficially different from the other rooms in the building.



 There is [if d_4 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] hatch leading west. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: cellar
infos.desc:
You've entered a cellar.

 You scan the room for a shelf, and you find a shelf. The shelf is typical.[if there is something on the s_4] On the shelf you can make out [a list of things on the s_4], so there's that.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_4] But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of junk.[end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east.

infos.name: closet
infos.desc:
You're now in the closet.

 Look over there! a formless safe.[if c_9 is open and there is something in the c_9] The formless safe contains [a list of things in the c_9]. There's something strange about this being here, but you can't put your finger on it.[end if][if c_9 is open and the c_9 contains nothing] The formless safe is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south. There is an unblocked exit to the west.

infos.name: restroom
infos.desc:
You are in a restroom. A standard one. Let's see what's in here.



There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: bathroom
infos.desc:
You've seen better bathrooms, but at least this one seems pretty standard.



 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] birch passageway leading east. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: bedchamber
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a bedchamber. An ordinary kind of place.

 [if c_10 is locked]A locked[else if c_10 is open]An open[otherwise]A closed[end if] typical looking safe is in the corner.[if c_10 is open and there is something in the c_10] The safe contains [a list of things in the c_10]. Suddenly, you bump your head on the ceiling, but it's not such a bad bump that it's going to prevent you from looking at objects and even things.[end if][if c_10 is open and the c_10 contains nothing] The safe is empty! What a waste of a day![end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: launderette
infos.desc:
You've just shown up in a launderette.



There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: cubicle
infos.desc:
You have moved into a cubicle. Not the cubicle you'd expect. No, this is a cubicle. You decide to start listing off everything you see in the room, as if you were in a text adventure.

 You see a display.[if c_11 is open and there is something in the c_11] The display contains [a list of things in the c_11].[end if][if c_11 is open and the c_11 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if]

There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: playroom
infos.desc:
You've entered a playroom. Let's see what's in here.

 You see a mantle. I guess it's true what they say, if you're looking for a mantle, go to TextWorld. The mantle is usual.[if there is something on the s_5] On the mantle you see [a list of things on the s_5].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_5] The mantle appears to be empty. Hm. Oh well[end if]

There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.desc: The gateway looks manageable. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

objective: Hey, thanks for coming over to the TextWorld today, there is something I need you to do for me. First off, make an attempt to head east. With that over with, take a trip south. After that, travel west. Then, move south. With that accomplished, make sure that the birch passageway in the bathroom is open. After that, go east. And then, try to travel east. And then, try to head north. Following that, venture north. Once you accomplish that, pick up the book from the floor of the bedroom. Got that? Good!
